name: Knucklebone
description:
Play a match 3 puzzle game with a twist! Use your logic to beat progressively more difficult puzzles.

Simply tap once to select a knucklebone (a picture tile), then tap somewhere else to place the tile, or swap it.

Tired of mindlessly crushing candy or matching jewels?

Try this free to play puzzle game and exercise your brain.

Featuring:

* free to play logic puzzles - start off easy, and work your way to almost impossible
* easy to learn, hard to master game play
* gentle beginner levels to teach you how to play
* 70 levels!
* 5 gravity modes
* gameplay built to be color-blind accessible
* multiple color schemes to suit all tastes
* play again and Improve your scores
